statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE reorder_point < 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE reorder_point < 5 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM Inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND stock_level < 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, SUM(stock_level) AS total_stock FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_stock > 20;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels LIMIT 10
SELECT id, product_name FROM reorder_points WHERE reorder_point > 50
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_level < 20
SELECT id, product_name, reorder_point FROM reorder_points ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_levels ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM stock_levels
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY stock_level DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(stock_level) AS total_stock FROM stock_levels GROUP BY product_name
SELECT sl.product_name, sl.stock_level, rp.reorder_point FROM stock_levels sl JOIN reorder_points rp ON sl.product_name = rp.product_name
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_level > reorder_point
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT product_name, stock_level, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < reorder_point;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE reorder_point < stock_level ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY stock_level DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level < reorder_point;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC, stock_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level <= reorder_point;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date, quantity_changed FROM Transactions WHERE quantity_changed < 0;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM Products WHERE stock_level < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, reorder_point FROM Products WHERE stock_level < reorder_point AND reorder_point > 0;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM Customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, stock_level, reorder_point FROM Products WHERE stock_level < reorder_point ORDER BY reorder_point ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_location FROM Customers WHERE customer_location LIKE '%California%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(stock_change) AS total_stock_change FROM Products JOIN StockHistory ON Products.product_id = StockHistory.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_stock_change DESC;
